instruction: What kind of spectrum was used in the spectroscopic liquid biopsy approach to detect brain tumors?

instruction: What spectral feature processing methods were employed in the spectroscopic liquid biopsy approach to detect brain tumors?

instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the performance of the liquid biopsy in the spectroscopic liquid biopsy approach to detect brain tumors, and how accurate was it in detecting brain tumors?
